actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide elective coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all officers and employees of the United States.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides elective coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system (Title II) of the Social Security Act for all officers and employees of the United States and its instrumentalities.

titles.title: A bill to provide elective coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all officers and employees of the United States.
